Translations.Text: glorified est Unus summoned His servus (Muhammad) nox Sanctus Masjid Mecca) to farthest locus de prostration surroundings nos beatus in order show eum some de noster signum! He est Hearer Seer
Similarly nos dedit Moses scripture rendered it beacon Infans Israel ut Vos non set any idol Dominus Magister Me
They est descendants de those nos carried Noah; he est appreciative servus
Nos addressed Infans Israel scripture Vos commit gross malus terra twice Vos destined fall major heights arrogance
When primus temporis advenit pass nos send vos servus de ours possess major might they invade tuus domus! Hoc est prophecy advenit pass
Afterwards nos dedit vos turn over them supply vos ut lot de wealth infans; nos dedit vos superior manus

Vos work righteousness vos work righteousness tuus suus bonus si vos commit malus vos perfecit ita tuus suus detriment. Ergo when secundus temporis advenit pass they defeat vos iniit masjid just prout they perfecit primus temporis They wipe out totus gains vos accomplished
Tuus Dominus showers vos His mercy. Vos revert transgression nos counter retribution. Nos designated Gehenna prout ultimus abode disbelievers
Hoc Quran guides bene path brings bonus news to believers lead righteous vita ut they deserved major recompense
Prout pro those disbelieve Hereafter nos prepared them painful retribution
human est saepe prays something hurt eum thinking he praying something bonus. human est est impatient

Nos rendered nox feria 2 signum. Nos factus nox dark feria lighted ut vos seek provisions tuus Dominus therein. Hoc alias establishes vos timing system means calculation! Nos sic explain everything in detail
Nos actum fate omnis human est it tied his neck Feria Resurrection nos manus eum actum est accessible
Read tuus suus actum! Hodie vos suffice prout tuus suus reckoner
Whoever guided guided his suus bonus whoever iit astray perfecit ita his suus detriment! Non sinner bear sins de anyone alias Nos nunquam punish 1 sending messenger
Nos est annihilate any community nos let dux commit vast corruption therein! Dodum they deserve retribution nos annihilate it completely
Multus generation habet nos annihilated Noah. Tuus Dominus est efficient in dealing cum sins His servus; He est fully Cognizant Seer
Anyone chooses hoc fleeting vita his priority nos rush eum quod nos decide dedit eum tunc nos commit eum Gehenna he suffers forever despised defeated
Prout pro those choose Hereafter prout their priority work righteousness dum believing their efforts appreciated
Pro each unus de them nos provisus; nos provisus pro those these tuus Dominus bounties. Tuus Dominus bounties est inexhaustible
(Note quam nos preferred some people others in hoc vita)! differences Hereafter est far major far significant
Vos non set any alius deus DEUS lest vos finis despised disgraced

(Tuus Dominus decretum vos non worship absque Eum tuus parentes honored Prout long prout 1 ambo them vivens vos nunquam dictus to them Uff slightest gesture annoyance) nor shall vos shout them; vos treat them amicably
Ac inferior pro them wings humility kindness dictus My Dominus habet mercy them they levabat me infancy
Tuus Dominus est fully aware de tuus innermost thoughts. Vos maintain righteousness He est Forgiver de those repent
Vos dedit due alms relatives needy poor traveling alien non est excessive extravagant
extravagant est brethren devils devil est unappreciative de his Dominus
Et si vos turn them vos pursue mercy de tuus Dominus vos treat them nicest moris
Vos non keep tuus manus stingily tied tuus neck nor shall vos foolishly open it up lest vos finis blamed ac sorry
Tuus Dominus increases provision anyone He chooses reduces it He est fully Cognizant de His creatures Seer
Vos non kill tuus infans due to fear de poverty! Nos provisus pro them alias prout pro vos. Killing them est gross offense
Vos shall commit adultery; it est gross sin malus behavior
Vos non kill any person - Pro DEUS factus vita sanctus! - Absque justice Unus killed unjustly tunc nos dedit his heres authority enforce justice Sic he non exceed limits avenging murder he helped
Vos non touch orphanus moneta absque pro their suus bonus dum they reach maturity. Vos fulfill tuus covenants covenant est major responsibility
Vos dedit foderator measure when vos trade weigh equitably! Hoc est bene ac righteous
Vos non accept any information vos verify it yourself. Ego dedit vos hearing eyesight brain vos est responsible pro using them
Vos non walk proudly terra - Vos non bore terra nor potuit vos est prout tall prout montis
Totus malus behavior condemned tuus Dominus
Hoc est some de wisdom inspired to vos tuus Dominus. Vos non set alias deus DEUS lest vos finis Gehenna blamed defeated
Tuus Dominus dedit vos garcio habuit dum dedit angels filia!? Quam vos utter such blasphemy
Nos cited in hoc Quran (totus generis de examples) ut they take heed it unus augments their aversion
Dictus ibi est any alius deus Eum prout they claim they tried overthrow Possessor throne
He glorified He est much too exalted far supra their utterances
Glorifying Eum est 7 universes terra everyone them! ibi est nihil non glorify Eum vos non understand their glorification! He est Clement Forgiver
When vos read Quran nos locus vos those non believe in Hereafter invisible barrier
Nos locus shields their minds prevent them ex understanding it deafness their ears Ac when vos preach tuus Dominus using Quran alone they run aversion
Nos est fully aware de quod they hear when they listen to vos when they conspire secretly - disbelievers dictus Vos subsequentis crazy vir
Note quam they describe vos quam hoc causa them stray off path
They dictus Post nos turn into bones fragments nos get resurrected anew
Dictus Et vos turn into rocks iron

Et vos turn into any generis de creation ut vos deem impossible They tunc dictus Qui bring nos back Dictus Unus created vos in the 1 locus, They tunc shake their heads dictus When testimentum est? Dictus est closer than vos think
Feria He summons vos vos respond de praising Eum vos tunc realize ut vos extremum in hoc vita short dum
Tell My servus treat each alius bonus possible moris devil semper try drive wedge them! Surely devil est vir ardent enemy
Tuus Dominus knows vos bene! His knowledge He shower vos cum mercy, He requite vos. Nos non send vos est their advocate
Tuus Dominus est bene knower de everyone in caelum terra. Prout hoc knowledge nos preferred some prophets others. Pro example nos dedit David Psalms
Dictus Implore whatever idols vos set Eum. They non habet power relieve tuus afflictions nor potuit they prevent them
Et idols they implore seeking via means their Dominus. They pray His mercy fear His retribution. Surely retribution tuus Dominus est dreadful
ibi non est community nos non annihilate Feria Resurrection inflict severe retribution them! Hoc iam scripsit book
Quod stopped nos ex sending miracles est ut proximus generations rejected them! Pro example nos showed Thamoud camel profound (miracle) they transgressed it Nos sent miracles unus instill reverence

Nos informed vos ut tuus Dominus fully controls people nos rendered vision ut nos showed vos test people tree est accursed Quran! Nos showed them solid proofs instill reverence them hoc unus augmented their defiance
When nos dictus to angels, Fall prostrate Adam they fell prostrate Satan. He dictus ego prostrate 1 Vos Shall created mud
He dictus Abinde Vos honored eum me Vos respite me Feria Resurrection ego possess totus his descendants ut few
He dictus Tunc iit; vos those subsequentis vos finis Hell tuus requital; equitable requital
Vos entice them tuus voice mobilize totus tuus forces totus tuus vir them share in their moneta infans promise them! Anything devil promises est non multus than illusion
Prout pro My servus vos non habet power them. Tuus Dominus suffices advocate
Tuus Dominus est Unus causa ships float ocean ut vos seek His bounties! He est Merciful towards vos
Vos afflicted sea vos forget tuus idols sincerely implore Eum alone prout soon prout He saves vos shore vos revert Indeed human est est unappreciative
Vos guaranteed ut He habuit non causa terra shore swallow vos? Alias ut He non send vos tempest tunc vos non invenit protector
Vos guaranteed He habuit non return vos sea alias temporis, tunc send vos storm drowns vos tuus disbelief? Dodum hoc happens nos non dedit vos alias chance
Nos honored infans Adam provisus them rides on terra in sea Nos provisus pro them bonus provisions nos dedit them major advantages than multus de noster creatures
Feria advenit when nos summon omnis people unus their actum. Prout pro those dedit actum righteousness they perfecit read their actum non suffer parvus injustice
Prout pro those est blind in hoc vita they est blind Hereafter et ut lot malus
They fere diverted vos revelations nos dedit vos. They wanted vos fabricate something alias in order consider vos friend
Si non est nos strengthened vos vos fere leaned towards them just ut parvus bit
Habet vos perfecit ut nos doubled retribution vos in hoc vita post decessus vos invenit non 1 help vos nos
They fere banished vos terra get rid de vos they revert vos sinister
Hoc est consistently case totus messengers nos sent vos vos invenit ut noster system nunquam changes
Vos observe Contact Prayer (Salat) when sun declines ex its highest point apud meridie it moves sunset. Vos alias observe (recitation Quran apud dawn Reciting Quran apud dawn testis)
Nox vos meditate extra credit ut tuus Dominus levabat vos prenobilis rank
Dictus My Dominus admit me prenobilis admittance let me obiit prenobilis departure grant me Vos powerful support
Proclaim truth prevailed falsehood vanished falsehood inevitably vanish
Nos send down Quran healing mercy believers. Apud the same temporis, it unus increases wickedness transgressors
When nos beatus human est he becomes preoccupied heedless. when adversity strikes eum he turns despondent
dictus Everyone works prout his belief tuus Dominus knows bonus quae unus guided rectus path
They ask vos revelation. Dictus revelation advenit my Dominus! knowledge dedit vos est minute
Nos testimentum nos take quod nos revealed vos tunc vos non invenit protector nos
Hoc est mercy tuus Dominus. His blessings vos est major
Dictus Si totus humans totus jinns manus unus in order produce Quran hoc they nunquam produce anything it non matter quam much assistance they lent 1 alias
Nos cited people in hoc Quran totus generis de examples multus people insist upon disbelieving
They dictus Nos non believe vos vos causa fontis gush ground
Alias unless vos suus garden de datum palms grapes rivers running per it
Alias unless vos causa masses caelum vos claimed fall nos! Alias unless vos bring DEUS angels noster eyes
Alias unless vos suus luxurious mansion alias vos climb caelum. Et si vos climb nos non believe vos bring book nos potuit read Dictus Glory est my Dominus. Est ego any multus than human messenger
Quod prevented people ex believing when guidance advenit them their dictus est DEUS send human est messenger
Dictus Si terra inhabited angels nos sent down them caelum angel messenger
Dictus DEUS suffices prout testis me vos! He est fully Cognizant de His worshipers Seer

Whomever DEUS guides the enim guided unus. Ac whomever He sends astray vos nunquam invenit them any dominus magister Eum. Nos summon them Feria Resurrection forcibly; blind dumb surdus! Their destination est Hell; whenever it cools nos increase their fire
Such est their just retribution abinde they rejected noster revelations. They dictus Post nos turn into bones fragments nos resurrected new creation
they non vide DEUS created caelum terra est able to create same creations? (Ut) He predetermined them irrevocable vita span disbelievers insist upon disbelieving
Proclaim Si vos possessed my Dominus treasures mercy vos withheld them fearing vos exhaust them! human est est stingy
Nos supported Moses 9 profound miracles - ask Infans Israel! When he iit them Pharaoh dictus to eum ego think vos Moses bewitched
He dictus Vos know foderator bene ut non 1 manifest these obviously Dominus de caelum terra. Ego think vos Pharaoh doomed
When he pursued them prout he chased them terra nos drowned eum unus those sided eum totus de them
Nos dictus to Infans Israel afterwards Iit vivens hoc terra! When ultimus prophecy advenit pass nos summon vos totus 1 group
Truthfully nos sent it down truth it advenit Nos non send vos bearer bonus news alias prout warner
Quran nos released slowly in order vos read it people long period nos sent it down totus apud dodum
Proclaim Believe in it non believe in it Those possess knowledge proximus scriptures when it recited them they fall down their chins prostrating
They dictus Glory est noster Dominus. Hoc fulfills noster Dominus prophecy
They fall their chins prostrating weeping Pro it augments their reverence
Dictus Alias Eum DEUS alias Eum the Multus Gracious; whichever cognomen vos use Eum belongs bonus cognomen. Vos non utter tuus Contact Prayers (Salat) too loudly nor secretly; use moderate tone
proclaim Praise est to DEUS qui nunquam genitus est filius nor perfecit He habet partner His kingship nor perfecit He need any ally marasmus magnify Eum constantly
